Hernandez associate to return to Mass.

Ernest Wallace, who surrendered in Florida after learning he was wanted in connection with ex-Patriot Aaron Hernandez's alleged slaying of Odin Lloyd, will not fight efforts to return him to Massachusetts to face justice, his lawyer said. (6:57 p.m.)

Man's body washes up on Winthrop Beach

The man appeared to have ingested a lot of water, but rescuers did not detect any other obvious signs of trauma, a fire official said. (6:02 p.m.)

N.H. woman disappears after filing for divorce

Kelly Robarge was reported missing Thursday, hours after filing for divorce from her husband, according to a report. (1:12 p.m.)

seek to change state tip law
